page.title: 10Scouts
page.content: Every Thursday at 6.30pm I go to Scouts.I have been in Scouts for 1 year.I belong to the 1st Porchester Scouts & Guide Group.We have 35 members in our troop.The meeting starts at 6.45pm until 8.35pm.We start with flag break and then we have a game of crab football.The beginning of this month we saw the beginning of a new badge scheme called Scout Award.Two times a year we go on camp.We have 100 members in our group. Sometimes we have activity days at Oxton.We do lots of subjects.The Scouts Association has been going since 1909,Lord Baden Powell started it on small island in Poole Harbour. We have six patrols and six members in each of them. By Simon Morris.
